name: Mr Alien
description:
Team VGCJG present: Mr Alien

A 3D rolling game created for UE4MegaJam 2019

. . and while Mr Alien was approaching earth, a giant asteroid hit his spaceship. Oh no what a disaster!Mr Alien found himself free falling to that weird but interesting planet.  All he sees is brown rocks and landscapes. Also, the temperature is so hot! A new adventure begins! Mr Alien now has to find a way to escape this planet. He notices a sign. It writes "Welcome to New Mexico". And an exciting journey begins!!

***

Pre-created assets: Water from: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/water-materials Desert assets from: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/stylized-desert-environment Glass for the ball from: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/advanced-glass-material-pack Sounds from Soundly

***

Controls: WASD to move Space to Jump ESC to open the pause menu E to interact Left Shift to accelerate Left CTRL to slow down
